name: Ghost Hunter (boop)
description:
A simple horror game where the goal is to catch the Ghost before the time runs out, but be warned... If you cause too much damage to the building you could cause it to collapse and be trapped inside forever. 

Sneaking will use up more of your time but is essential in preventing the ghost's attack. If the ghost jumps out and scares you, it will gain some of it's health back.

\\ This game is just a proof of concept prototype for a project way back in college. Probably not that fun to play //
